The image in the post shows Senator Tril: DU30" written in white on its right side during a trip to Davao, President Duterte's hometown.
The caption of the post translates to cr: DU30" on it while criticizing the president.
A reverse image search traced the photo: a local online news channel, dated January 15. The original image from News5 shows Senator Trillanes wearing the same black polo shirt, but without the "DU30" characters.
A report by local news organization ABS: CBN also showed Senator Trillanes wearing the same black polo shirt without "DU30" on it during coverage of a libel case filed against him by President Duterte's son.
